autoClaim.label: Karɓa ta atomatik:
autoClaim.tapToSetup: Taɓa don kunna karɓar lada ta yau da kullum ta atomatik

tooltip.title: Lada ta Yau da Kullum ta Atomatik
tooltip.description: Kunna <bold>karɓa ta atomatik</bold> don samun lada ta UBI na $10 a rana ta atomatik—ba bukatar karɓa da hannu!

benefits.midnight: Ana karɓa da tsakar dare a yankin lokacinku
benefits.lowerFees: Kudin gas ya ragu da 80% (an haɗa tare da wasu masu amfani)
benefits.disable: Kuna iya kashewa kowane lokaci a Saituna

tooltip.notice: Za ku sanya hannu a saƙon izini sau ɗaya wanda ke ba relay damar karɓa a madadinku. Ba a raba maɓallan sirri.

settings.cadenceHint: Auto-claim will run on this schedule
settings.title: Saitunan Karɓa ta Atomatik
settings.description: Karɓi lada ta yau da kullum ta atomatik.
settings.preferredHourHint: Zaɓi lokacin da karɓa ta atomatik ya gudana

manual.title: Karɓa da Hannu
manual.description: Idan kana buƙatar kuɗi da wuri, karɓi lada na gaba da ke akwai yanzu. Karɓa da hannu tana amfani da gas ɗin walat ɗinka. Karɓa ta atomatik ta fi arha idan ka jira. Idan walat ɗinka ba shi da kuɗi, kunna karɓa ta atomatik ko ƙara gas na asali kafin karɓa da hannu.
manual.noProof: Ba a buga tabbacin lada ba tukuna. Gwada sake bayan hoton yau ya zama samuwa.
manual.unauthorized: Izinin relayer ya gaza. Da fatan za a gwada sake ko tuntuɓar goyon baya.
manual.invalidDay: No rewards available to claim yet
manual.gasNotice: Manual claims use your wallet's gas. Auto-claim stays cheaper if you wait.
manual.newWalletHint: If your wallet is unfunded, enable auto-claim or top up native gas before manual claim.

payout.title: Zaɓin Biyan Kuɗi
payout.description: Zaɓi kuɗin biyan da kuka fi so.

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.testnetNotice: Token na testnet ba su da daraja ta gaske
wallet.swapComingSoon: Musanya na zuwa nan ba da jimawa ba

manageTokens.title: Sarrafa Tokens
manageTokens.info: Ƙara tokens na ERC-20 na al'ada. Ana haɗa tokens na tsari ta tsoho.
manageTokens.autoFetch: Ana karɓar alama da decimals ta atomatik
manageTokens.noCustomTokens: Ba a ƙara tokens na al'ada ba tukuna.
manageTokens.addUsingForm: Ƙara token ta amfani da fom a sama.
manageTokens.systemToken: Wannan token token ne na tsari kuma an riga an haɗa shi.
manageTokens.enterValidAddress: Shigar da adireshin token mai inganci

addressBook.title: Litattafan Adireshi
addressBook.noContacts: Ba a ajiye masu sadarwa ba.
addressBook.addForQuickSending: Ƙara masu sadarwa don aikawa cikin sauri.

settings.title: Saitunan Wallet

export.title: Fitar da Wallet
export.description: Kada ku raba jumlar dawowa ko maɓalli mai zaman kansa. Ajiye su cikin aminci a waje.
export.recoveryPhraseNotAvailable: Jumlar dawowa ba ta samuwa ba (an shigo da ita ta maɓalli mai zaman kansa)
export.privateKeyWarning: Maɓalli Mai Zaman Kansa (ajiye a asirce!)
export.warning: Kada ku raba jumlar dawowa ko maɓalli mai zaman kansa da kowa.
export.clipboardWarning: Wasu apps na iya karanta clipboard. Za a share ta atomatik a cikin sakan 30.
export.verifyForKey: Tabbata don Nuna Maɓalli Mai Zaman Kansa
export.verifyDescription: Shigar da kalmar sirri ko PIN don bayyana bayanan wallet masu mahimmanci.

import.title: Shigo da Wallet
import.description: Shigo da zai maye gurbin wallet na yanzu. Tabbata kun yi backup na wanda ake amfani da shi da farko. Lura cewa za ku sake tabbatar da matsayin PoH bayan shigo da.
import.keyPlaceholder: Shigar da maɓalli mai zaman kansa 0x…
import.success: An shigo da wallet cikin nasara!

dangerZone.title: Yankin Haɗari
dangerZone.description: Waɗannan ayyuka ba za a iya soke su ba. Tabbata kun yi backup na wallet.
dangerZone.forgetDescription: Cire wallet daga wannan na'ura. Tabbata kun yi backup na jumlar dawowa.
dangerZone.confirmMessage: Wannan zai cire wallet daga wannan na'ura. Tabbata kun yi backup na jumlar dawowa da farko.
dangerZone.unableToForget: Ba a iya mantawa da wallet ba
dangerZone.resetDescription: Share duk bayanan wallet gaba ɗaya kuma fara sabo.

settings.authPrompt: Tabbata don bayyana maɓalli mai zaman kansa

reset.title: Sake Saita Wallet
reset.dangerTitle: Wannan aikin ba za a iya soke shi ba!
reset.warning1: Sake saita wallet zai share har abada:
reset.bullet3: Duk saitunan app da abubuwan da aka fi so
reset.recoveryNote: Idan kuna da jumlar dawowa ta kalmomi 12, kuna iya dawowa da wallet bayan sake saita.
reset.confirmDescription: Rubuta "RESET" a ƙasa don tabbatar da kuna son share duk bayanan wallet.
reset.resettingDescription: Ana share duk bayanan wallet. Ku jira...
reset.completeDescription: An sake saita wallet. Yanzu kuna iya saita sabon wallet ko shigo da wanda ake amfani da shi.
reset.error: Ba a iya sake saita wallet ba. Sake gwada.

export.verifyDescription: Shigar da kalmar sirri don fitar da wallet.
export.passphraseDescription: Zaɓi jumla mai ƙarfi don ɓoye backup. Za ku buƙaci wannan jumlar don shigo da wallet daga baya.
export.passphraseTooWeak: Jumla ba ta da ƙarfi. Yi amfani da aƙalla haruffa 8.
export.includeSeedDescription: Ana ba da shawara don cikakken backup
export.confirmDescription: Sake shigar da jumlar don tabbatarwa.
export.warning: Ajiye wannan backup cikin aminci. Duk wanda ke da damar wannan fayil da jumla zai iya samun damar wallet.
export.exportingDescription: Ana ɓoye da shirya backup na wallet...
export.successDescription: An ƙirƙiri backup na wallet mai ɓoye. Ajiye shi cikin aminci.
export.rememberPassphrase: Ku tuna jumlar fitarwa - za ku buƙaci ta don shigo da wannan backup.
export.exportKeystoreDesc: Ajiye fayil na keystore mai ɓoye

security.title: Tsare Wallet
security.subtitle: Saita kalmar sirri ko PIN don kare wallet
security.pinDesc: Mai sauri da sauƙi don tunawa
security.biometricsDesc: Yi amfani da {{type}} don buɗewa cikin sauri. Kuna iya canza wannan daga baya a Saituna.
security.enableBiometricsPrompt: Tabbata don kunna buɗewa ta biometric
security.passwordTooWeak: Kalmar sirri ba ta da ƙarfi. Bi shawarwari.
security.passwordMismatch: Kalmar sirri ba ta dace ba
security.pinDescription: Samun damar sauri, sauƙi don tunawa

lock.title: Buɗe Umotu
lock.tooManyAttempts: Ƙoƙari da yawa. Sake gwada a cikin {{time}}.

deviceSecurity.emulatorTitle: Na'ura Ba A Goyan Bayanta Ba
deviceSecurity.emulatorMessage: Wannan app ba zai iya gudana a emulators saboda tsaro ba.

settingsSecurity.title: Tsaro
settingsSecurity.passwordChanged: An canza kalmar sirri cikin nasara

keyReveal.cooldownMessage: Don tsaro, kuna iya bayyana maɓallanku sake a cikin {{time}}.
keyReveal.cooldownReason: Wannan yana hana apps masu mugunta samun damar maɓallanku cikin sauri.

passwordVerify.title: Tabbatar da Asali
passwordVerify.description: Shigar da kalmar sirri ko PIN don bayyana bayanan wallet masu mahimmanci

passwordValidation.tooShort: Kalmar sirri dole ta kasance aƙalla haruffa 8
passwordValidation.commonPassword: Wannan kalmar sirri ce da ake amfani da ita sau da yawa
passwordValidation.lengthSuggestion: Yi amfani da aƙalla haruffa 12 don tsaro mai kyau

forgot.title: Sake Saita Bayanan Tsaro
forgot.warning: Don sake saita kalmar sirri ko PIN, za ku buƙaci shigar da jumlar wallet. Wannan yana tabbatar da cewa ku ne mai wallet.
forgot.warningText: Kada ku raba jumlar ku da kowa.
forgot.seedDescription: Shigar da jumlar ku ta kalmomi 12 ko 24. Raba kowace kalma da sarari.
forgot.invalidSeed: Shigar da jumla mai inganci ta kalmomi 12 ko 24
forgot.confirmPasswordDesc: Sake shigar da kalmar sirri don tabbatarwa
forgot.confirmPinDesc: Sake shigar da PIN don tabbatarwa
forgot.completeDescription: An sake saita bayanan tsaro. Yanzu kuna iya buɗe wallet da sabuwar kalmar sirri ko PIN.
forgot.passwordTooWeak: Kalmar sirri ba ta da ƙarfi. Zaɓi mai ƙarfi.
forgot.passwordMismatch: Kalmar sirri ba ta dace ba
forgot.resetFailed: Sake saita ya gaza. Tabbatar da jumlar ku.

send.title: Aika
send.selectTokenInfo: Zaɓi token don aikawa. Ana nuna tokens masu ma'auni kawai.
send.addTokensFirst: Ƙara tokens zuwa wallet da farko

gasNotice.stablecoin: Za a biya gas da stablecoin.
gasNotice.reserved: Mun tanadi {{amount}} {{symbol}} don gas; kuna iya aikawa aƙalla {{max}}.

errors.invalidAddress: Adireshin mai karɓa ba ingantacce ba
errors.insufficientGas: Ma'auni ba ya isa don gas
errors.insufficientGasWithHint: Ma'auni ba ya isa don gas. Ƙara UMT ko stablecoin mai goyan baya.
errors.notEnoughForGas: Ba isasshen ma'auni don biyan gas ba
errors.noStableGas: Ba isasshen UMT don gas ba kuma babu stable mai goyan baya.
errors.permitFailed: Izini ko amincewa ta gaza don token na gas
errors.relayNotConfigured: Ba a saita relay na stable gas ba
errors.transactionReverted: Ma'amala ta koma baya a kan-chain.
errors.approvalNeeded: Token na gas yana buƙatar amincewa amma babu UMT don amincewa. Ƙara ɗan UMT ko yi amfani da token mai goyan bayan izini.

addressBook.title: Littafin Adireshi
addressBook.saveForQuickAccess: Ajiye adireshin don samun damar sauri
addressBook.enterValidAddress: Shigar da adireshi mai inganci da farko

batch.noRecipients: Ba a ƙara mai karɓa ba tukuna
batch.invalidAmount: Adadin da ba daidai ba ga {{recipient}}
batch.createFirstTag: Ƙirƙiri tag ɗin ku na farko a cikin littafi

tagPicker.title: Zaɓi Tag
tagPicker.createHint: Da farko ƙara tags ga lambobi a cikin littafi

pay.title: Biya
pay.description: Duba QR code na abokinku don biya kai tsaye zuwa wallet

receive.title: Karɓa
receive.description: Duba wannan QR code don aikawa biya zuwa wannan adireshi

empty.title: Babu Ma'amala Tukuna
empty.description: Tarihin ma'amalanku zai bayyana nan da zarar kun aika ko karɓi tokens.
empty.filteredDescription: Gwada wani adireshi ko tacewa daban.

details.title: Cikakkun Ma'amala
details.inferredNote: An gano wannan ma'amala daga canjin ma'auni. Ba a samun cikakkun bayanan kan-chain ba.

display.title: Nuni
display.showSentinelCardDesc: Nuna samun kuɗi a allo na gida
display.showDailyRewardsCard: Nuna Katin Lada ta Yau da Kullum
display.sentinelSettingsDesc: Sarrafa haɗin, lada & karɓa ta atomatik

sentinelDisplay.title: Nuni na Sentinel
sentinelDisplay.showSentinelCardDesc: Nuna katin samun sentinel a allo na gida

verification.title: Tabbatarwa
verification.description: Tabbatar da mutumcinku da inLyf don buɗe lada ta yau da kullum. Duba liveness cikin sauri; sake tabbatarwa lokaci-lokaci.
verification.refreshAvailableIn: Sabuntawa za ta iya samuwa cikin ranaku {{days}}

network.title: Hanya
network.mainnet: Mainnet (na zuwa nan ba da jimawa ba)

cache.title: Cache
cache.description: Share bayanan cache don sabunta bayanan token da kwangila.
cache.cacheCleared: An share cache! Sake farawa don amfani.

chainGuardian.title: Mai Tsaron Chain
chainGuardian.description: Taimaka tsare blockchain ta barin wayar ku a kan layi. Kammala aƙalla aikin samfura ɗaya a kowace rana don ci gaba da cancanta lada.
chainGuardian.minBatteryHint: Ba zai gudana ƙasa da wannan matakin ba
chainGuardian.backgroundHint: Yana aiki ko da app an rufe
chainGuardian.noSamples: Babu aiki tukuna. Bar app a buɗe don farawa.
chainGuardian.staleWarning: Ba a gani a yau ba — sake buɗe app don ci gaba.
chainGuardian.androidBatteryWarning: Tsarin battery na iya hana sampling
chainGuardian.androidBatteryHint: Je zuwa Saituna → Apps → Umotu → Battery → zaɓi "Ba a Takura ba" don ba da izinin sampling a baya.
chainGuardian.tip: Kunna "Gudana a Baya" don mafi kyawun samun lada.

permissions.title: Izini
permissions.description: Sarrafa Mini Apps masu haɗi da izininsu.
permissions.lastUsed: Na Ƙarshe da Aka Yi Amfani

verify.title: Tabbatar da Kuna Mutum
verify.description: Don karɓar lada ta yau da kullum, tabbatar da kuna mutum na musamman.

poh.subtitle: Buɗe lada ta yau da kullum
poh.description: Tabbatar da liveness da inLyf don buɗe lada. Ba a ajiye biometrics a kan-chain; kawai takaddun ɗan gajeren lokaci ana bayarwa.
poh.howItWorksDesc: Duba liveness cikin gajarta (duba fuska) yana tabbatar da kuna mutum. Takaddar ku tana aiki na kwanaki 90 kuma ana iya sabuntawa kowane lokaci.

status.expired: Tabbatarwa ta ƙare ko ba a samu ba.
status.expiredDetail: Sake gudana liveness don sabunta takaddar ku.

sentinelSettings.header: Shiga cikin tafkin Sentinel don taimakawa kammala blocks. Haɗa aƙalla mafi ƙarancin adadi, bar na'urarku a kan layi, kuma samu lada.
sentinelSettings.unavailable: Module na sentinel ba a samu ba

bond.createDescription: Haɗa UMT don shiga kwamitin sentinel kuma fara samun kuɗi.
bond.topUpDescription: Ƙara stake don samun babban rabo na lada.

autoClaim.title: Karɓa ta Atomatik
autoClaim.description: Bari relayer ya karɓi lada ta sentinel ta atomatik lokacin da suka tara.

activity.title: Ayyuka na Kwanan nan
activity.noClaims: Babu karɓa a cikin blocks {{blocks}}k na ƙarshe.
activity.noSlashes: Babu abubuwan yanke a cikin taga na kwanan nan.

errors.configureEnv: Saita RPC + sentinel contract env vars.
errors.noWallet: Ƙirƙiri ko shigo da wallet don shiga kwamitin sentinel.
errors.loadFailed: Ba a iya loda bayanan sentinel ba.

toast.noRewards: Babu lada ana jira don karɓa.
toast.autoClaimEnabled: An kunna karɓa ta atomatik na sentinel
toast.autoClaimDisabled: An kashe karɓa ta atomatik na sentinel
toast.autoClaimFailed: Kunna/kashe karɓa ta atomatik ya gaza
toast.minBondUnavailable: Ƙarancin haɗi ba a samu ba
toast.minBondRequired: Haɗin farko dole ya kasance aƙalla {{amount}} UMT
toast.topUpGreaterThanZero: Adadin ƙara dole ya kasance fiye da 0
toast.insufficientBalance: Ma'auni ba ya isa don haɗi + gas
toast.bondReverted: Haɗi ya koma baya a kan-chain

miniapps.title: MiniApps
miniapps.subtitle: Bincika apps da aka gina a Umotu
miniapps.explore: Bincika apps da aka gina a Umotu
miniapps.comingSoon: Na Zuwa Nan ba da Jimawa ba
miniapps.pohDescription: Tabbatar da mutumcinku da inLyf don buɗe lada ta yau da kullum.

vision.title: Muhimmancin Mu
vision.description: Umotu yana gina ababen more rayuwa don duniyar da kowa zai iya shiga cikin tattalin arzikin duniya—ba tare da la'akari da inda suke rayuwa ko banki da suke amfani da shi ba.

ubi.title: Dala $10/Rana, Kowa a Ko'ina
ubi.description: Kudin shiga na asali na duniya a matsayin lada da aka samu don tsare hanyar sadarwa. Duk wanda ke da waya zai iya shiga kuma samu.

capital.title: Babban Jari Yana Motsi Kyauta
capital.description: Kusa da sifili don biya da canja wuri—ko'ina ko na gida. Kasuwanci suna biyan ~0.1% don rufe farashin dandamali, mutane ba su biya komai.

sovereignty.title: Mutunta Sarautar Kuɗi
sovereignty.description: Ba mu maye gurbin kuɗaɗen fiat ba—muna inganta su. Bankuna suna bayarwa stablecoins masu alaƙa da kuɗin gida. Manufofin kuɗi sun zama mafi inganci tare da isarwa mai faɗi da ƙarancin jayayya.

vision.notReplacing: Umotu ba ya gasa da bankunan tsakiya. Muna gina ababen more rayuwa mafi kyau don kuɗaɗen fiat: ƙarancin jayayya, samun damar duniya, da ingantaccen kasuwa da juriya.

building.title: Muna Gina Tsarin
building.description: Waɗannan apps suna nuna abin da za a iya yi a Umotu. Wasu suna shirye yanzu, wasu na zuwa nan ba da jimawa ba. Masu haɓakawa a duniya suna gayyata su gina kuma su ƙaddamar a dandamalin mu.

sendMoney.name: Aika Kuɗi
sendMoney.description: Aika UMT ko stablecoins nan take zuwa kowa, a ko'ina a duniya—ba buƙatar bankuna.
sendMoney.example: Aika $20 zuwa iyalinku a waje a cikin sakan, ba kwanaki ba. Babu ɓoyayyun kuɗi.

billPay.name: Biyan Kuɗi
billPay.description: Biya kayan aiki, waya, intanet, da sauransu kai tsaye daga wallet.

savings.name: Daidaitaccen Ajiya
savings.description: Ajiyar juyawa ta gargajiya (tontine, chit fund) da aka sanya ta amincewa da kwangiloli masu wayo.

microLoans.name: Ƙananan Rance
microLoans.description: Rance tsakanin mutane da mutane da aka goyan bayan tabbatar da mutumcinku da suna.

rideSharing.name: Raba Tafiya
rideSharing.description: Yi rajista tafiye-tafiye da aka biya da crypto. Direbobi suna riƙe da yawa, masu tafiya suna biyan ƙasa—babu mai tsakiya yana ɗaukar 30%.
rideSharing.example: Tafiyar taksi a Lagos tana kashe ₦800. Direba yana samun ₦799.2 maimakon ₦560.

delivery.name: Isarwa
delivery.description: Yi odar abinci, kayan miya, ko fakiti. Masu isarwa suna samun albashi mai kyau a stable tokens.
delivery.example: Yi odar abincin rana, biya da stablecoin na gida, mai isarwa yana samun biya nan take.

publicTransit.name: Sufuri na Jama'a
publicTransit.description: Biya bas, metro, da jiragen ƙasa da taɓa. Ba buƙatar sayen katin fare.

hotels.name: Otel & Zama
hotels.description: Yi rajista masauki a duniya. Masu masauki suna karɓar stablecoins, baƙi suna ceton kuɗi.
hotels.example: Yi rajista ɗaki a Bali akan $40/rana. Mai masauki yana samun $39.96.

flights.name: Jiragen Sama
flights.description: Nemo kuma yi rajista jiragen sama. Biya da crypto, samu lada ta UMT.

tours.name: Yawon shakatawa na Gida
tours.description: Yi rajista abubuwan da jagora na gida. Biya kai tsaye zuwa gare su.

localMarket.name: Kasuwa ta Gida
localMarket.description: Saye da sayarwa a gida. Biya na QR yana sa ciniki na titi ya zama mara kyau.
localMarket.example: Mai sayarwa a Jakarta yana karɓar USDC. Abokin ciniki yana biya, mai sayarwa yana ganin kuɗi nan take.

ecommerce.name: Ciniki na Kan Layi
ecommerce.description: Sayi kan layi daga 'yan kasuwa a duniya. Babu kuɗin kati, babu koma baya.
ecommerce.example: Sayi kayan lantarki daga Shenzhen. Biya da stablecoins, ceto 3% da kati.

marketplace.name: Kasuwar Tsakanin Mutane
marketplace.description: Jera abubuwa don sayarwa, sayi daga wasu. Escrow yana kare bangarorin biyu.

remittance.name: Aikawa Kuɗi Gida
remittance.description: Aika kuɗi gida. Masu karɓa za su iya canza zuwa kuɗin gida ko riƙe shi na dijital.
remittance.example: Aika $200 daga Amurka zuwa Philippines. Mai karɓa yana samun ₱11,000+ maimakon ₱10,400.

freelance.name: Aiki na Freelance
freelance.description: Samu biya don aikin gig nan take. Babu jira kwanaki 30 don canja banki.

homeServices.name: Ayyukan Gida
homeServices.description: Ɗauki masu aikin tube, lantarki, tsaftacewa. Biya kawai lokacin da aka gama aiki.

business.title: Gina Kasuwancin Ku a Umotu
business.subtitle: Ƙaddamar da apps tare da biya da aka gina
business.description: Ƙirƙiri apps da ke amfani da tsarin Umotu—miliyoyin mutane tabbatattu masu samun kuɗi na yau da kullum, shirye don ma'amala. Babu matsalar haɗa biya.

benefits.noFees: Kusa da sifili kuɗin sarrafa biya—riƙe 99.9% na kudaden shiga
benefits.verifiedUsers: Duk masu amfani mutane ne tabbatattu—babu bots ko zamba
benefits.globalReach: Isa masu amfani a ƙasashe 190+ daga rana ɗaya
benefits.instantPayments: Biya nan take—babu jira biyan kwanaki 30

business.exampleText: App na raba tafiya a Umotu yana riƙe 99.9% na kuɗin fare maimakon 70% a dandamali na gargajiya. Direbobi suna samun ƙari, masu tafiya suna biyan ƙasa.

bank.title: Shin Ku Banki Ne?
bank.subtitle: Bayar da stablecoins a Umotu
bank.description: Cibiyoyin kuɗi masu lasisi za su iya bayar da stablecoins na kuɗin gida a Umotu kuma su shiga tattalin arziƙin UBI mai girma tare da miliyoyin masu amfani.

benefits.reserves: Samu riba a ajiya: saka hannun jari a cikin bonds da abubuwa masu ƙarancin haɗari
benefits.mintRedeem: Caji kuɗin mint/redeem: yawanci 0.1% a canja fiat ↔ stablecoin
benefits.users: Samun damar miliyoyin masu amfani da UBI na yau da kullum
benefits.global: Faɗaɗa isarku zuwa waje nan take
benefits.custody: Ajiyar ku, kula da ku: cikakken iko akan abubuwan goyan baya

bank.revenueModel: Yadda Masu Bayarwa Suna Samun Kuɗi
bank.revenueNote: Kamar Tether da sauran manyan masu bayarwa, kudaden shiga suna zuwa daga ribar ajiya da kuɗin canja. Tare da miliyoyin masu amfani da ke karɓar UBI na yau da kullum, adadin mint/redeem zai iya zama mai yawa.
bank.futureNote: Masu bayarwa za su iya samun rabo na kuɗin ma'amala a nan gaba yayin da yarjejeniya ta ci gaba.

news.title: Labarai & Sabuntawa
news.description: Kasance da sabuntawa tare da sanarwa na kwanan nan, shawarwari, da gargadi na tsaro daga ƙungiyar Umotu.

governance.title: Mulki
governance.subtitle: Tsara makomar Umotu

description.title: Muryar Ku Tana Da Muhimmanci
description.body: Taimaka tsara makomar Umotu ta hanyar jefa ƙuri'a a shawarwarin al'umma. Gidauniyar Umotu tana shirya waɗannan ƙuri'u, amma al'umma ce ke yanke shawara.

governance.emptyHint: Duba daga baya don sabbin shawarwarin al'umma don jefa ƙuri'a.
governance.tapToVote: Taɓa zaɓi a sama don jefa ƙuri'ar ku

alreadyVoted.title: An Riga An Jefa ƙuri'a
alreadyVoted.message: Kun riga kun jefa ƙuri'a a wannan shawara.

confirm.title: Tabbatar da ƙuri'a
confirm.note: Wannan aikin ba za a iya soke shi ba.

success.title: An Ƙaddamar da ƙuri'a!
success.message: Na gode da shigar ku cikin mulkin al'umma.

error.title: ƙuri'a Ta Gasa
error.message: Ba a iya ƙaddamar da ƙuri'a ba. Sake gwada.

learn.title: Koyi
learn.subtitle: Duk abin da kuke buƙata don sanin Umotu

whatIs.title: Menene Umotu?
whatIs.subtitle: $10 a rana, ga kowa, ko'ina
whatIs.intro: Umotu yana nufin bari kowa ya samu kusan dala $10/rana ta amfani da wayar hannu kawai. Babu kayan aiki masu tsada, babu ƙwarewa na musamman, babu iyaka.
whatIs.noMiddleman: Babu mai tsakiya: Kuna mu'amala kai tsaye da hanyar sadarwa—ba buƙatar asusun banki
whatIs.globalAccess: Samun damar duniya: Yana aiki a ko'ina da intanet
whatIs.youOwnIt: Ku ne mallaki: Wallet ku, maɓallanku, ikon ku
whatIs.visionText: Biliyoyin mutane za su iya taimakawa riƙe babban littafi na jama'a da gaskiya kuma samu don shi. A Umotu, wayoyi suna yin ƙananan duba waɗanda ke sa hanyar sadarwa ta zama abin dogaro.
whatIs.nameOriginText: Umotu ya ɗauki wahayi daga Paʻumotu, harshe na Polynesian. Muna amfani da sunan cikin mutunci a matsayin tunatarwa don gina wa mutanen yau da kullum.

earn.title: Yadda Kuke Samu
earn.subtitle: Wayar ku tana aiki; ana biyan ku
earn.intro: Wayar ku tana yin ƙananan ayyuka waɗanda ke taimakawa kowa—sai ana ba ku lada.
earn.step1: 1) Tabbatar da kuna mutum: duba liveness cikin sauri (da sabuntawa lokaci-lokaci) yana tabbatar da kowane mutum yana da asusu ɗaya.
earn.step2: 2) Taimaka hanyar sadarwa: wayar ku tana gudana DA sampling da sauran duba masu sauƙi a baya.
earn.step3: 3) Samu lada ta yau da kullum: ana biyan ku don wannan aiki, tare da manufa kusan dala $10/rana dangane da manufofin hanyar sadarwa.
earn.localCurrencyText: Zaɓi token na biya: stablecoins na kuɗin gida (inda ake samu) ko UMT. Adadi yana nufin ~dala $10 na Amurka kuma yana iya canzawa tare da shiga da yanayin kasuwa.

whereMoney.title: Daga Ina Dala $10 Take?
whereMoney.subtitle: Kuna samu saboda kuna yin aiki
whereMoney.intro: Tambaya ce ta #1. Amsa gajarta: saboda kuna bayar da sabis da hanyar sadarwa ke buƙata.
whereMoney.realWork: Wayar Ku Tana Yin Aiki na Gaske
whereMoney.realWork1: DA Sampling: wayar ku tana duba cewa bayanan block ana samu kuma daidai
whereMoney.realWork2: Shigar Mutane: kuna tabbatar da mutum-ɗaya-asusu don hana bots da spam
whereMoney.realWork3: Waɗannan ayyuka suna kare kowa; ba tare da su hanyar sadarwa ta raunana ba
whereMoney.utility: Amfani: biya mai sauri, ƙarancin kuɗi da mutane suka zaɓa don amfani
whereMoney.consensus: Yarda: daraja da ke girma yayin da ƙarin mutane za su iya tabbatarwa kuma su yarda da dokoki
whereMoney.newTokens: Ana ƙirƙiro sabbin tokens na UMT kuma ana raba su da wayoyi tabbatattu (ba da validators ba)
whereMoney.fees: Rabo na kuɗi da ginshikin gini ana raba su da sentinel na waya don kammala blocks
whereMoney.treasury: Ƙaramin rabo yana tallafawa ci gaba da shirye-shiryen kwanciyar hankali
whereMoney.btcProblem: Bitcoin yana ba da lada ga masu hakar ma'adinai na musamman (mai tsadar jari)
whereMoney.ethProblem: Ethereum yana ba da lada ga manyan masu staking (mai tsadar jari)
whereMoney.umotuSolution: Umotu yana ba da lada ga wayoyi na yau da kullum (ƙarancin tsada don shiga)
whereMoney.conclusion: Ba kyauta ba ce: ana biyan ku don aiki da ke riƙe ababen more rayuwa na kuɗi na jama'a da gaskiya da amfani.

security.title: Tsaro na Wallet
security.subtitle: Kare kuɗin ku
security.intro: Wallet ku kamar rumbun dijital ne wanda ku kaɗai kuke sarrafawa.
security.recovery: Kalmomi 12 Ku & Maɓalli Mai Zaman Kansa
security.recoveryText: Kalmomin sirri 12 (jumlar dawowa) da maɓalli mai zaman kansa duka suna buɗe wallet. Duk wanda ke da ɗayansu zai iya motsa kuɗin ku.
security.rule1: KAR KU raba kalmomi 12 ko maɓalli mai zaman kansa da kowa—ko da masu ba da gudummawa na Umotu.
security.rule2: Rubuta kalmomi 12 a takarda kuma ajiye su a waje. Kada ku adana su a hotuna, ko bayanan girgije.
security.rule3: Idan kun fitar da maɓalli mai zaman kansa, ajiye shi a waje (takarda, hardware, ko mai sarrafa ɓoye da kuka amince da shi gaba ɗaya).
security.rule4: Idan kun rasa kalmomi 12 da maɓalli mai zaman kansa, ba wanda zai iya dawowa da wallet.
security.warningText: Maɓalli mai zaman kansa yana ba da cikakken samun dama. Bayyanawa ko kwafi zuwa wasu apps zai iya fallasa kuɗin ku. Fitarwa kawai idan kun fahimci haɗari.
security.reveal: Bayyana / Fitar da Maɓalli Mai Zaman Kansa
security.revealText: Kuna iya bayyana ko fitar da maɓalli mai zaman kansa a Saitunan Wallet. Muna buƙatar biometrics/PIN, nuna shi na 'yan sakan kawai, kuma ba mu taba ɗaukawa ba. Yi la'akari da amfani da wallet na hardware don manyan ma'auni.
security.best1: Kunna kulle allo & biometrics a wayar ku.
security.best2: Riƙe app ɗin sabuntawa don samun sabbin gyare-gyaren tsaro.
security.best3: Yi amfani da wallet daban don manyan ajiya; riƙe ƙananan adadi a waya don amfani na yau da kullum.
security.scamBannerTitle: Ba Wani Legit Zai Nema Ba
security.scamBannerText: Idan wani ya nemi kalmomi 12 ko maɓalli mai zaman kansa, zamba ce.

stablecoins.title: Fahimtar Stablecoins
stablecoins.subtitle: Kuɗi na dijital da ke bin kuɗin gida
stablecoins.intro: Stablecoins tokens ne na dijital da aka tsara don bin kuɗi na yau da kullum (kamar USD, ZAR, NGN).
stablecoins.example1: 1 ZAR1 ≈ 1 Rand na Afirka ta Kudu
stablecoins.backedText: Stablecoins a Umotu ana bayarwa da abokan hulɗa masu tsari kuma aka tsara don riƙe daraja 1:1 tare da ajiya. Masu bayarwa suna buga tabbacin ajiya da sharuɗɗan fansa.
stablecoins.convertText: Canja ta bankunan abokan hulɗa/musanya, ko yi amfani kai tsaye inda aka karɓa.

economics.title: Tattalin Arzikin UMT
economics.subtitle: Wane ya samu me da me yasa
economics.intro: UMT yana da isasshen adadi na tokens biliyan 100. Yawancinsa ana biya wa masu amfani da waya na yau da kullum waɗanda ke taimakawa riƙe hanyar sadarwa da gaskiya.
supplyBullets: Mafi yawan samar da alamomin ana tanada su ga mahalarta wayar tarho a tsawon lokaci kuma ana sakin su ta hanyar Emission Controller. Emission Controller yana iyakance fitowar yau da kullun zuwa bai fi 0.01% na sauran tanadin ba, yana tabbatar da dorewa na dogon lokaci. A karkashin wannan jadawalin, kusan kashi 68% na jimlar tanadin ya rage bayan shekaru 10, kuma kusan kashi 15% ya rage bayan shekaru 50.
An kirkiro karamin bangare na tanadin a lokacin kaddamar don takamaiman dalilai, ciki har da airdrop na farkon masu amfani, sayarwa na al'umma, rabon gidauniya, da ajiyar gaggawa da sauransu.
economics.premine: Rabon Kaddamarwa (na wucin gadi, na iya canzawa a lokacin kaddamar da mainnet)
economics.emissions: Lada ta Yau da Kullum don Wayoyi
economics.emissionsText: Kowace rana hanyar sadarwa za ta iya fitar da aƙalla 0.01% na sauran tafkin fitarwa. Muna kasafi wannan adadi don wayoyi tabbatattu su nufa kusan dala $10/rana, daidaitawa tare da yawan mutane da ke shiga da yanayin kasuwa.
economics.feesText: Masu taimakon Sentinel (zaɓi, na ci gaba) suna samun rabo na kuɗin ma'amala da tayin gini. Wannan daban da fitarwa ta yau da kullum.
economics.transparencyText: Jadawalin vesting da wallet na jama'a ne. Iyakar fitarwa ta yau da kullum da biyan da aka samu ana bugawa a app.
economics.disclaimerText: Wannan ba shawara ce ta saka hannun jari ba. Lada ta dogara da manufofin hanyar sadarwa da shiga. App ba ya tabbatar da samun kuɗi tsayayye.

contribute.title: Yadda Ake Ba da Gudummawa
contribute.subtitle: Taimaka Gina Umotu
contribute.intro: Umotu buɗaɗɗe ne kuma al'umma ke tuƙa shi. Kowa zai iya taimakawa—ko kuna rubutawa, fassara, ko kawai ba da ra'ayi.

code.title: Inganta Lambar
code.text: Gyara kurakurai, ƙara fasaloli, rubuta gwaje-gwaje, ko duba pull requests. Duba repos na GitHub don app, kwangiloli masu wayo, da sabis na baya.

translate.title: Taimaka da Fassara
translate.text: Sanya app ya ji na halitta a harshe ku. Gyara fayilolin i18n na gida kuma gwada kowane allo. Gyare-gyaren ku suna taimakawa miliyoyin.

wordlists.title: Faɗaɗa Lissafin Kalmomi na BIP-39
wordlists.text: Ba da shawara sabbin ko ingantattun lissafin kalmomi don ƙarin mutane su ga jumlar dawowa ta kalmomi 12 a harshensu na asali.

governance.title: Shiga Mulki
governance.text: Karanta shawarwari, tattauna a fili, kuma jefa ƙuri'a a app. Muryar ku tana taimakawa jagorantar sigogin hanyar sadarwa da rarraba tallafi.

community.title: Yaɗa Labari
community.text: Faɗa wa abokai, rubuta jagorori, buga shorts, amsa tambayoyi. Al'umma mai ƙarfi tana nufin hanyar sadarwa mai ƙarfi ga kowa.

contribute.note: Duk gudummawa na son rai ne. Babu aiki na yau da kullum ko biya sai idan an bayyana a cikin shawara na tallafi.

decentralization.title: Me Yasa Rarraba Ikon
decentralization.subtitle: Babu wani wuri guda na sarrafawa
decentralization.intro: Rarraba iko yana nufin babu kamfani ko gwamnati guda da zai iya rufe hanyar sadarwa ko ƙwace kuɗin ku.
decentralization.benefit2: Ƙananan kuɗi: ƙananan kuɗin hanyar sadarwa maimakon kuɗin kati 3–5%
decentralization.benefit3: Babu iyaka: aikawa daraja a duniya
decentralization.benefit4: Juriya ga hana: maɓallanku, kuɗin ku
decentralization.benefit5: Bayyane: kowa zai iya tabbatar da yadda tsarin yake aiki
decentralization.howWorksText: Validators suna ba da shawara blocks kowane ~sakan 2. Wayoyi (kamar naku) suna tabbatarwa kuma kammala da duba masu sauƙi. Ƙananan gudummawa da yawa suna haɗuwa zuwa tsaro mai ƙarfi.

noCompany.title: Babu Kamfani, Babu Abokan Ciniki
noCompany.subtitle: Fahimci Tsarin
noCompany.intro: Babu 'Umotu, Inc.' da ke sarrafa yarjejeniya. Umotu saitin dokoki ne buɗaɗɗe da kowa zai iya amfani da shi.
noCompany.notCompany: Abin da Umotu BA YA BA
noCompany.notCompany1: BA kamfani tare da asusun abokan ciniki ba
noCompany.notCompany2: BA banki ko mai aikawa kuɗi ba
noCompany.notCompany3: BA wani abu guda ke sarrafawa ba
noCompany.notCompany4: BA zai iya juyar da ma'amala ba
noCompany.whatIs1: Yarjejeniya: kamar email ko yanar gizo—buɗaɗɗe, dokoki masu mu'amala
noCompany.whatIs2: Na farko waya: yana gudana tare da taimakon wayoyi masu wayo na yau da kullum
noCompany.whatIs3: Al'umma ke tuƙa: ku mai shiga ne, ba abokin ciniki ba
noCompany.foundationIntro: Ƙungiya mai zaman kanta da ke tallafawa tsarin (apps na misali, takardu, shirye-shiryen al'umma) amma ba ta sarrafa yarjejeniya ba.
noCompany.foundationTask1: Riƙe app na waya & explorer a matsayin misalai na misali
noCompany.foundationTask2: Sarrafa wasu ababen more rayuwa na jama'a (wasu za su iya gudana nasu)
noCompany.foundationTask4: Duba kuma jera stablecoins masu goyan baya
noCompany.foundationNote: Gidauniya ba za ta iya samun damar wallet ku ba kuma ba za ta iya juyar da ma'amala ba.

scamPrevention.title: Gujewa Zamba
scamPrevention.subtitle: Kare Kan Ku
scamPrevention.intro: Gidauniyar Umotu BA ZA TA TABA DM KU BA. Duk wanda ke pretendin 'tallafi' mai zamba ne.
scamPrevention.redFlag1: Wani da ke da'awar tallafi na abokin ciniki
scamPrevention.redFlag2: Hanyoyin haɗi zuwa 'tabbatar' ko 'haɓaka' asusun ku
scamPrevention.redFlag3: Neman kalmomi 12 ko maɓalli mai zaman kansa
scamPrevention.redFlag4: Alƙawuran bonus tokens idan kun aika kuɗi
scamPrevention.redFlag5: Apps ko shafuka da ke neman 'kunna' lada
scamPrevention.truth1: Babu tallafi na abokin ciniki da zai iya sake saita wallet ku
scamPrevention.truth2: Duk sabuntawa na hukuma suna bayyana a wannan app
scamPrevention.truth3: Ba wani daga Umotu zai nemi jumlar dawowa ko maɓalli mai zaman kansa ba
scamPrevention.truth4: Saukar da wannan app kawai daga Apple App Store ko Google Play na hukuma
scamPrevention.whatToDo: Idan Wani Ya Sadar Da Ku

airdrop.title: Airdrop na Testnet
airdrop.subtitle: Masu amfani da farko ana san su
airdrop.intro: Kun zo da wuri! Umotu yana cikin testnet. Masu amfani da testnet masu aiki za su iya samun rabo lokacin da mainnet ya ƙaddamar.
airdrop.step2: Kammala tabbatarwa na mutum (Proof of Human)
airdrop.step3: Yi amfani da app akai-akai a lokacin testnet
airdrop.whyTestnet: Testnet yana da mahimmanci: masu amfani suna koyon tsaro na wallet, kuma ana gwada tsarin don tsaro, ƙarfi, da inganci kafin mainnet.
airdrop.timeline: Ana sa ran mainnet a Q1 ko Q2 na 2026. Airdrop zai faru a kusa da lokacin da mainnet ya ƙaddamar.
airdrop.totalPool: Jimlar tafkin airdrop: 1,000,000,000 tokens na UMT. Rabon ku ya dogara da jimlar masu shiga da farashin UMT a farawa.
airdrop.scenario2: Masu amfani 1M: ~1,000 UMT a kowane, farashi ana sa ran ~$1, darajar airdrop ~$1,000
airdrop.scenario3: Masu amfani 10M: ~100 UMT a kowane, farashi ana sa ran ~$20, darajar airdrop ~$2,000
airdrop.scenario4: Masu amfani 100M: ~10 UMT a kowane, farashi ana sa ran ~$300, darajar airdrop ~$3,000
airdrop.disclaimer: Waɗannan tsinkaye ne kawai, ba tabbaci ba. Darajoji na gaske ya dogara da yanayin kasuwa da dokokin shirin.
airdrop.reward: A mainnet, wallet na testnet zai iya karɓar tokens na gaske dangane da shiga da dokokin shirin. Masu amfani da farko da masu aiki ana fifita su.
airdrop.note: Lura: Tokens na testnet ba su da daraja. Duk wani rabo na mainnet ana ƙaddara ta manufofin shirin a farawa. Duk labarai game da airdrop za a buga kawai a wannan app.

gettingStarted.title: Fara
gettingStarted.subtitle: Mintunan farko biyar ku
gettingStarted.check5: 5) Bar app a gudana don samun lada ta yau da kullum
gettingStarted.tip1: Ba da izinin gudana a baya don duba za su iya gudana
gettingStarted.tip2: Duba kowace rana don ganin lada
gettingStarted.tip3: Gayyaci abokai—ƙarin masu amfani yana ƙarfafa hanyar sadarwa

errors.networkError: Kuskuren hanyar sadarwa. Duba haɗin ku.
errors.genericError: Wani abu ya faru ba daidai ba. Sake gwada.

onboard_wallet_explain: Ƙirƙiri ko shigo da wallet don karɓar lada.
wallet_import_explain: Shigar da jumlar dawowa ta kalmomi 12
wallet_backup_explain: Rubuta waɗannan kalmomi 12 a jeri. Wannan ita ce HANYA KAɗAI don dawowa da wallet idan kun rasa na'urarku.
wallet_backup_warning: Kada ku raba jumlar dawowa. Duk wanda ke da waɗannan kalmomi zai iya samun damar kuɗin ku.
wallet_save_first: Ku ajiye jumlar dawowa da farko

seedReveal.title: Jumlar Dawowa
seedReveal.intro: Jumlar dawowa ita ce hanyar kawai don maidowa da wallet idan kun rasa damar wannan na'ura. Rubuta ta kuma ajiye ta cikin aminci a waje.
seedReveal.hiddenMsg: An ɓoye jumlar ku don tsaro. Taɓa ƙasa don bayyanawa.
seedReveal.noScreenshot: Kada ku ɗauki hoton jumlar dawowa.
seedReveal.checkPrompt: Shigar da kalmomin ƙasa don tabbatar da kun rubuta su daidai:
seedReveal.checkIncorrect: Ɗaya ko fiye kalmomi ba daidai ba. Duba backup ku.
seedReveal.ackCannotRecover: Na fahimci Umotu ba zai iya dawowa da wallet ba
